labels: design, my-health, ux
assignees: MarciMcGuire

---

## :star2: User Story
As a designer, I want to create user flows so that they can be used for reference during design intent and development.

## :star2: Tasks
- [ ] Move issue to In Progress when beginning work
- [ ] Create user flows for product being developed 
- [ ] Decide: Should a content and accessibility review be part of this ticket or separate tickets due to scope?
- [ ] Move issue to Review/QA when ready for team to review
- [ ] Schedule time or start Slack thread to get team to review and provide feedback
- [ ] Incorporate feedback as needed
- [ ] Include link when scheduling design intent after creating wireframes
- [ ] Add link to the user flows in a comment in this issue
- [ ] Move ticket to Closed when acceptance critera has been met

## :star2: Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] User flows have been created
- [ ] Team has reviewed and provided feedback
- [ ] Team feedback has been incorporated if appropriate
- [ ] Link to user flows has been added to product design documentation
- [ ] Key user flow decisions have been recorded in product design documentation
